channel.title: Globular on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Globular on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: That's a whole LOT of stars
item.description: I’ve only shown globular clusters twice before and the last time was two years ago. It’s past time for a fresh look.

item.title: Globular Clusters
item.description: Here are four representative Globular clusters. Globular Clusters are gigantic spherical agglomerations of stars that surround the nucleus of our Milky Way galaxy. Each globular cluster from hundreds of thousands to several million stars, and astronomers believe that the stars is most globular clusters are among the oldest stars in existance, perhaps as much as 10 billion years old.
